Posts.Content: Dec 12, 2016 08:38PM amazonmich wrote: I donated my hair to Locks of Love before chemo started. Then I didn't loose my hair thanks to cold caps. Ha ha ha! Joke was on me. 3 years later my hair still isn't as long as it was. oh well. I had a nice short cut for a year or so. And...At least I provided beautiful hair for someone. Michele
Posts.Title: Is ok to cut my hair before treatments win-chimed amazonmich
